summary: The diff updates header/footer branding to show an image and adds a BrandLogo component, but it does not add or reference the exact required logo filename, does not ensure the static asset is actually added, does not use BrandLogo in the footer, and retains/mentions logo-management/backend-logo logic that violates the “only this logo, no logo UI/backend calls” constraints.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add the user-uploaded logo image file "EYEGIC LOGO for ID cards-5.png" to the frontend as a static asset and use this exact image as the only logo image used anywhere in the app.
missing_requirements.reason: No new static asset file is added (Added files: none), and the code references a different filename (the ".dim_1536x1024.png" variant) instead of the exact required "EYEGIC LOGO for ID cards-5.png".

missing_requirements.requirement: Implement a reusable BrandLogo component and replace the text-based brand rendering in the site header and footer with the BrandLogo component.
missing_requirements.reason: SiteHeader uses BrandLogo, but SiteFooter imports BrandLogo and still renders a raw directly instead of using the BrandLogo component.

missing_requirements.requirement: Remove/avoid any remaining logo-related logic or references that would cause another logo to appear (including logo-management UI/hooks/utilities), while keeping settings routes disabled/absent.
missing_requirements.reason: The repo still includes/mentions frontend utilities and hooks for fetching/uploading logos from the backend and a settings page for uploading/replacing a logo, which contradicts the requirement to avoid logo-management UI and backend logo calls and to have no other logo logic.

hallucinated_features.description: Using a different logo asset filename ("/assets/generated/EYEGIC LOGO for ID cards-5.dim_1536x1024.png") instead of the requested exact file "EYEGIC LOGO for ID cards-5.png".
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly constrains usage to the exact uploaded file name and forbids alternate variants; the diff references a different, derived filename.

hallucinated_features.description: Logo backend integration and logo upload/replace UI (hooks/utilities for fetching/uploading a site logo; branding logo settings page).
hallucinated_features.reason: Non-goals/REQ-8 prohibit exposing logo upload/fetch/settings UI and prohibit backend calls for logo retrieval/setting; the diff summary text indicates these components/utilities exist.
